titles.title: A concurrent resolution welcoming the Board of Directors of the Japan Association of Travel Agents on the occasion of their visit to the United States.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 8/4/1988--Introduced. Welcomes the Board of Directors of the Japan Association of Travel Agents on their visit to the United States.
